Hiking & Mountaineering

Jun 22, 2020

This is a list of my favourite mountain hikes and mountaineering routes grouped by regions.

At Unter-/ Oberammergau & Ettal

  • Ettaler Manndl (1633m) - online description
  • Teufelstättkopf & Pürschling (1758)m - online description
  • Notkarspitze (1889m) - online description

Estergebierge

  • Hohe Kiste (1922m)
  • Hoher Fricken (1940m) - online description
  • Krottenkopf (2086m) - online description

At Garmisch

  • Kramer (1985m) – online description

At Kochel:

  • Benediktenwand (1801m) - online description
  • Jochberg (1565m) - online description
  • Heimgarten (1790m) - online description

At Krün, Mittenwald:

  • Schöttelkarspitze (2050m) - online description
  • Soiernspitze (2257m) - online description

At Lermoos

  • Daniel (2340m) - online description

Karwendel

  • Gamsjoch  (2452m) - online description
  • Hahnkampl (2082hm) - online description
  • Sonnjoch (2457m) - online description
  • Kompar (2011m) - online description
  • Steinfalk (2347m) - online description
  • Lamsenspitze (2508m) - online description
  • Torscharte & Torkopf (2014m) - online description
  • Fleischbank, Hölzelstalljoch & Grasbergjoch (2026m) - online description
